entry.title: HOTW Web Interface Updates
entry.content:
Web framework

Sinatra

UI

  • Twitter Bootstrap
  • Bootbox for modal confirmation

Database

  • SQL Server
  • ActiveRecord as ORM
  • JDBC

Deployment##

  • Warler to package project into a WAR file
  • deploy to JBoss (upload WAR file using WinSCP, instead of using JBoss web admin console, which throws out of memory error)
